name: Telesign Trust Engine
description: TeleSign's Trust Engine is a comprehensive suite of APIs that enables businesses to optimize their account security, deliver user verification, and prevent account fraud. With Trust Score, PhoneID, and SMS Verification, businesses can confidently protect their users and their digital assets.

name: Litzia Professional IT Services
description: Litzia offers a range of professional IT services tailored to meet the needs of businesses. From network infrastructure design to cybersecurity solutions, Litzia ensures that your IT systems are robust, secure, and efficient.

name: Chat Technologies
description: Chat Technologies provides innovative chat solutions for businesses of all sizes. With cutting-edge chatbot technology and customizable messaging platforms, businesses can engage with customers seamlessly and efficiently.

name: Inita
description: Inita is a platform that empowers individuals and businesses to create stunning websites without the need for coding knowledge. With intuitive drag-and-drop tools and beautiful templates, Inita makes website building a breeze.

name: AIM Agency
description: AIM Agency is a full-service marketing agency specializing in digital marketing strategies. From SEO and social media management to content creation and PPC campaigns, AIM Agency helps businesses grow their online presence and reach their target audience.
